params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The name of the instance that will serve the new database. Values are of the form projects/<project>/instances/<instance>.

params.name: data.create_statement
params.description: Required. A CREATE DATABASE statement, which specifies the ID of the new database. The database ID must conform to the regular expression [a-z][a-z0-9_\-]*[a-z0-9] and be between 2 and 30 characters in length. If the database ID is a reserved word or if it contains a hyphen, the database ID must be enclosed in backticks (`).

params.name: data.extra_statements
params.description: Optional. A list of DDL statements to run inside the newly created database. Statements can create tables, indexes, etc. These statements execute atomically with the creation of the database: if there is an error in any statement, the database is not created.

methods.name: getParent
methods.description:

Values are of the form projects/<project>/instances/<instance>.

methods.name: getCreateStatement
methods.description:
Required. A CREATE DATABASE statement, which specifies the ID of the new database. The database ID must conform to the regular expression [a-z][a-z0-9_\-]*[a-z0-9] and be between 2 and 30 characters in length.

If the database ID is a reserved word or if it contains a hyphen, the database ID must be enclosed in backticks (`).

methods.name: getExtraStatements
methods.description:
Optional. A list of DDL statements to run inside the newly created database. Statements can create tables, indexes, etc. These statements execute atomically with the creation of the database: if there is an error in any statement, the database is not created.
